methods.name: busy
methods.description: This represents the busy state of the underlying computation engine, not the busy state of the kernel. The kernel is busy when it is processing a request, but the runtime is busy only when a computation is running.

methods.name: open_editor
methods.description: This event is used to open an editor with a given file and selection.

params.name: file
params.description: The path of the file to open

params.name: line
params.description: The line number to jump to

params.name: column
params.description: The column number to jump to

methods.name: show_message
methods.description: Use this for messages that require immediate attention from the user

params.name: message
params.description: The message to show to the user.

methods.name: prompt_state
methods.summary: New state of the primary and secondary prompts
methods.description: Languages like R allow users to change the way their prompts look. This event signals a change in the prompt configuration.

methods.name: working_directory
methods.description: This event signals a change in the working direcotry of the interpreter
